nodes.documentation: A particular case of a periodic contract where the height increased by one every period
nodes.name: Daily

nodes.documentation: @return 1 as this contract is set  to be changing every single day.
nodes.name: getLength

nodes.documentation:
@param _timestamp unix epoch seconds 
@return Number of days that happened since this contract was deployed to the  target timestamp
nodes.name: heightOf

nodes.documentation: @return A particular case of heightOf, using the current timestamp
nodes.name: height
